body: $B?7$7$$%a!<%k%"%I%l%9$r$*CN$i$;$7$^$9(B$B?7$7$$%a!<%k%"%I%l%9!'(B lep00142008@yahoo.co.jpGreetings,There is a serious political problems here in my country right now and they have killed my parents.Plz i am seeking for your urgent help to transfer $ 4.8 millions into your bank account for investment purpose.10% is for your help.Contact me at +22505212947 for more details.Charles.- lep00142008@yahoo.co.jp
